title: Spike's The Mist Review
itunes:title: Spike's The Mist Review
itunes:subtitle: The Losers -- Randall Colburn, Justin Gerber, and Editor-In-Chief Michael Roffman -- review Spike’s The Mist, offer some Needful Tweets, head to Hollywood King, and dump out the ol’ Bag of Bones. Chapters include: Intro, Needful Tweets (3:5...
description:
The Losers -- Randall Colburn, Justin Gerber, and Editor-In-Chief Michael Roffman -- review Spike’s The Mist, offer some Needful Tweets, head to Hollywood King, and dump out the ol’ Bag of Bones. 


Chapters include: Intro, Needful Tweets (3:50), Headlines and Hollywood King (13:46), Spike’s The Mist (30:45), Bag of Bones (46:19), and Outro (1:33:50)


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
